title: La Gritta brings original plates from Roma to Phuket Island
text:
La Gritta brings original plates from Roma to Phuket Island La Gritta brings original plates from Roma to Phuket Island   18, 2015 | 0 | F&B Promotion – from my hometown Roma 
Phuket, 18 August 2015 – La Gritta, Amari Phuket’s Italian restaurant presents a new promotion, “From my Hometown Roma”, introducing three new dishes cooked by original Italian chef, Patrizia from Rome. The promotion includes the following: Coda alla Vaccinara 
Coda alla Vaccinara is priced at 550 THB++ Slowly cooked oxtail in heavy red wine with root vegetables, creamy mash potato and a touch of dark chocolate Gnocchi di Patate con Salsa 
Gnocchi di Patate con Salsa is priced at 400 THB++ Potato gnocchi with pork ribs and Italian sausage braised in rich tomato sauce and topped with parmesan cheese Saltim Bocca alla Romana 
Saltim Bocca alla Romana is priced at 850 THB++ Veal scaloppini wrapped with aged Parma ham and sage with penne pasta, artichokes and parsley butter 
The promotion is now available until 30 September 2015. 
For more information, please call +66 (76) 292 697, email lagritta@amari.com or visit www.lagritta.com . Address: Amari Phuket, 2 Muen-ngern Road, Patong Beach, Kathu, Phuket 83150
